infotexts.entitydescription.geneextractor: A specialized fabricator designed for Extracting Genes.
infotexts.entitydescription.biostorage: A specialized Cabinet for organ repair.
infotexts.entitydescription.empty_syringe_bone: A empty syringe used for crafting.
infotexts.entitydescription.bone_marrow: A syringe full of Bone Marrow.
infotexts.entitydescription.stem_cells: A syringe full of Stem Cells.
infotexts.entitydescription.biological_material: A syringe full of Biological Material.
infotexts.entitydescription.bioprinter: A specialized fabricator designed for printing biological organs.
infotexts.entitydescription.stemcellprocessor: A specialized fabricator designed for synthesising Stem Cells.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.bonemarrowextracte: The patient's bone marrow has been extracted.
infotexts.entitydescription.chemmaster: A machine that makes pills out of chemicals loaded inside.
infotexts.lua.chemerror.invalidcategory.base: {id} is not a valid pill base.
infotexts.lua.chemerror.invalidcategory.binder: {id} is not a valid pill binder.
infotexts.lua.chemerror.invalidcategory.filler: {id} is not a valid pill filler.
infotexts.lua.chemerror.invalidcategory.active: {id} is not a valid active ingredient for pills.
infotexts.lua.chemerror.invalidcategory.dye: {id} is not a valid pill dye.
infotexts.lua.chemerror.capacity: This configuration can only support up to {cap} active ingredients.
infotexts.lua.chemerror.yield: This configuration would not yield any pills.
infotexts.entitydescription.chemalyzer: Displays the composition of pills that are placed inside.
infotexts.entitydescription.custompill: Who knows what effects this pill could have?
infotexts.entitydescription.custompill_horsepill: Quite big for you to haphazardly shove into your mouth.
infotexts.entitydescription.custompill_tablets: It can't be that bad, right?
infotexts.entitydescription.pillbottleregular: A plastic prescription bottle for storing pills.
infotexts.entitydescription.pillbottleadvanced: A large plastic bottle used to store various pills. It's fitted with a child proof lid that is impossible to open without medical education. Perfect for keeping grabby hands out of harm's way.
infotexts.entitydescription.bloodcultureominus: Combine with any blood plasma to fabricate an O- blood pack
infotexts.entitydescription.bloodcultureoplus: Combine with any blood plasma to fabricate an O+ blood pack
infotexts.entitydescription.bloodcultureabminus: Combine with AB blood plasma to fabricate an AB- blood pack
infotexts.entitydescription.bloodcultureabplus: Combine with AB blood plasma to fabricate an AB+ blood pack
infotexts.entitydescription.bloodcultureaminus: Combine with AB or A blood plasma to fabricate an A- blood pack
infotexts.entitydescription.bloodcultureaplus: Combine with AB or A blood plasma to fabricate an A+ blood pack
infotexts.entitydescription.bloodculturebminus: Combine with AB or B plasma to fabricate an B- blood pack
infotexts.entitydescription.bloodculturebplus: Combine with AB or B plasma to fabricate an B+ blood pack
infotexts.entitydescription.bloodcultureabcplus: Combine with C blood plasma to fabricate an C+ blood pack
infotexts.entitydescription.bloodplasmao: Compatible with O- and O+ blood and blood cell cultures\nPlasma infusions can be used to treat first and second degree burns, stabilize blood pH, and raise blood pressure similar to ringer's solution. \nIt can also temporarily prevent sepsis from increasing, as well as preventing neurotrauma stemming from liver failure.
infotexts.entitydescription.bloodplasmaab: Compatible with all blood and blood cell cultures\nPlasma infusions can be used to treat first and second degree burns, stabilize blood pH, and raise blood pressure similar to ringer's solution. \nIt can also temporarily prevent sepsis from increasing, as well as preventing neurotrauma stemming from liver failure.
infotexts.entitydescription.bloodplasmaa: Compatible with A-, A+, O-, and O+ blood and blood cell cultures\nPlasma infusions can be used to treat first and second degree burns, stabilize blood pH, and raise blood pressure similar to ringer's solution. \nIt can also temporarily prevent sepsis from increasing, as well as preventing neurotrauma stemming from liver failure.
infotexts.entitydescription.bloodplasmab: Compatible with B-, B+, O-, and O+ blood and blood cell cultures\nPlasma infusions can be used to treat first and second degree burns, stabilize blood pH, and raise blood pressure similar to ringer's solution. \nIt can also temporarily prevent sepsis from increasing, as well as preventing neurotrauma stemming from liver failure.
infotexts.entitydescription.bloodplasmaabc: Compatible with C+ blood and blood cell cultures\nPlasma infusions can be used to treat first and second degree burns, stabilize blood pH, and raise blood pressure similar to ringer's solution. \nIt can also temporarily prevent sepsis from increasing, as well as preventing neurotrauma stemming from liver failure.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.revived: You have been brought back from death's door.
infotexts.entitydescription.revive_syringe: A powerful mix to prevent eternal rest. Effective only on the dead.
infotexts.entitydescription.nanobots: A syringe full of tiny medical robots. They can heal everyone including previously revived people.
infotexts.entitydescription.symbiosis_syringe: A syringe containing a refined symbiote, granting strength and awareness while binding host and parasite as one.
infotexts.entitydescription.xenocrystal: A alien crystal formed from various metals.
infotexts.entitydescription.cyberarm: An arm made of metal and electronics. Faster and doesn't bleed. Use after amputation to install.
infotexts.entitydescription.cyberleg: A leg made of metal and electronics. Faster and doesn't bleed. Use after amputation to install.
infotexts.entitydescription.waterproofcyberarm: A waterproofed cyberarm made of metal and electronics. Faster and doesn't bleed. Use after amputation to install.
infotexts.entitydescription.waterproofcyberleg: A waterproofed cyberleg made of metal and electronics. Faster and doesn't bleed. Use after amputation to install.
infotexts.entitydescription.augmentedliver: A partially synthetic liver. An improved blood filtration system capable of removing toxins and improving the immune system, ready for reinsertion.
infotexts.entitydescription.augmentedkidney: A partially synthetic kidney. Improves blood production and clotting, altering blood type to C+ for compatibility with other cyber implants. Use after removal of the original kidney to install.
infotexts.entitydescription.augmentedheart: A partially synthetic heart. Improves muscle speed and blood pressure normalization. Use after removal of the original heart to install.
infotexts.entitydescription.augmentedlung: A partially synthetic set of lungs. Improves muscle speed, oxygen capacity, modulates breathing to balance blood pH, and provides brief pressure resistance. Use after removal of the original lungs to install.
infotexts.entitydescription.augmentedbrain: A neural augment chip for the brain. Improves skills, neurotrauma + addiction recovery, and removes the need for analgesia in surgery. Install into the patient's existing brain.
infotexts.entitydescription.cyberliver: A completely synthetic liver. A top of the line blood filtration system capable of removing toxins and improving the immune system, ready for transplant.
infotexts.entitydescription.cyberkidney: A completely synthetic kidney. A top of the line nano-blood production system which improves blood production and clotting, altering blood type to C+ for compatibility with other cyber implants. Use after removal of original kidney to install.
infotexts.entitydescription.cyberheart: A completely synthetic heart. A top of the line circulatory system, improving muscle speed and blood pressure normalization. Use after removal of the original heart to install.
infotexts.entitydescription.cyberlung: A completely synthetic set of lungs. A top of the line respiratory system, improving muscle speed, oxygen capacity, modulates breathing to balance blood pH, and provides partial pressure resistance. Use after removal of the original lungs to install.
infotexts.entitydescription.cyberbrain: A positronic cyberbrain implant chipset. Top of the line, supercharges skills, neurotrauma + addiction recovery, and removes the need for analgesia in surgery. Install into the patient's existing brain.
infotexts.entitydescription.abcpluscard: Can take blood from: all of them Can give blood to: C+
infotexts.entitydescription.immunosuppressantinhal: Depresses the immune system to reduce Cyberpsychosis caused by excessive cybernetic implants.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.ntc_cyberarm: The arm is made of metal and electronics
infotexts.afflictiondescription.ntc_cyberleg: The leg is made of metal and electronics
infotexts.afflictiondescription.ntc_waterproof: The limb is not exposed to the deleterious effects of water.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.ntc_cyberlung_pres: The Cyberlung is resisting severe pressure, briefly preventing implosion.
The Cyberlung has resisted severe pressure, and is undertaking self-repair routines.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.ntc_cyberpsychosis: The patient is suffering from Cyberpsychosis, a mental disorder caused by excessive cybernetic implants.
The patient has resistance to Cyberpsychosis.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.ntc_loosescrews: Some screws look dangerously close to falling out. Rattling can be heard when moving the limb.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.ntc_damagedelectro: The limb occasionally emits sparks of electricity. Some subsystems are reporting outages.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.ntc_bentmetal: The limb is bending in an unintended direction.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.ntc_materialloss: Parts of the limb are gone.
infotexts.entitydescription.mannitolplus: An improved version of mannitol. It is used to quickly treat neurotrauma.
infotexts.entitydescription.brainjar: A container to hold brain transplants indefinitely.
